00015         t_object                ob;     
00016 } t_loader;

00020 void*           loader_new(t_symbol *name, long argc, t_atom *argv);

00027 /************************************************************************************/
00028 // Main() Function
00029 
00030 int main(void)
00031 {
00032         t_class *c;
00033         
00034         jamoma_init();
00035 
00036         // Define our class
00037         c = class_new("jcom.loader",(method)loader_new, (method)NULL, sizeof(t_loader), (method)NULL, A_GIMME, 0);
00038 
00039         // Finalize our class
00040         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00041         loader_class = c;
00042         return 0;
00043 }

00049 void *loader_new(t_symbol *name, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00050 {
00051         t_loader *obj;
00052 
00053         obj = (t_loader*)object_alloc(loader_class);
00054         return obj;
